description.en-US: - Compatible with nearly all video and audio streaming sites including Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast sites, etc. - If pinned, tabs can have their own custom speed. - URL rules to automatically set a custom playback rate depending on the website. - Optional hotkeys for adjusting speed, rewinding/forwarding, frame by frame analysis, and more. - Apply filters (invert, grayscale, mirroring, etc) on select elements like videos, or even the entire page. Github: https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed
description.es: Traductor de google ---------------------------------- - Compatible con casi todos los sitios de transmisión de video y audio, incluidos Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, sitios de podcast, etc. - Reglas de URL para establecer automáticamente una velocidad de reproducción personalizada según el sitio web. - Teclas de acceso rápido opcionales para ajustar la velocidad, rebobinar / reenviar, análisis cuadro por cuadro, y más. - Aplique filtros (inversión, escala de grises, reflejo, etc.) en elementos seleccionados como videos, o incluso en toda la página. - Seguro, sin rastreadores y 100% de código abierto. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed) English ---------------------------------- - Compatible with nearly all video and audio streaming sites including Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast sites, etc. - URL rules to automatically set a custom playback rate depending on the website. - Optional hotkeys for adjusting speed, rewinding/forwarding, frame by frame analysis, and more. - Apply filters (invert, grayscale, mirroring, etc) on select elements like videos, or even the entire page. - Safe, no trackers, and 100% open source. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed)
description.ja: グーグル翻訳 --------------------------- - Youtube、Netflix、Twitch、Spotify、ポッドキャストサイトなど、ほぼすべてのビデオおよびオーディオストリーミングサイトと互換性があります。 - Webサイトに応じてカスタム再生レートを自動的に設定するURLルール。 - 速度の調整、巻き戻し/転送、フレームごとの分析などのためのオプションのホットキー。 - ビデオやページ全体などの選択した要素にフィルター（反転、グレースケール、ミラーリングなど）を適用します。 - 安全、トラッカーなし、100％オープンソース。 （https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed） English --------------------------- - Compatible with nearly all video and audio streaming sites including Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast sites, etc. - URL rules to automatically set a custom playback rate depending on the website. - Optional hotkeys for adjusting speed, rewinding/forwarding, frame by frame analysis, and more. - Apply filters (invert, grayscale, mirroring, etc) on select elements like videos, or even the entire page. - Safe, no trackers, and 100% open source. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed)
description.ko: 구글 번역 ---------------- - Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, Podcast 사이트 등 거의 모든 비디오 및 오디오 스트리밍 사이트와 호환 - 웹 사이트에 따라 사용자 지정 재생 속도를 자동으로 설정하는 URL 규칙. - 속도 조정, 되감기 / 전달, 프레임 별 분석 등을위한 옵션 단축키. - 비디오 또는 전체 페이지와 같은 선택된 요소에 필터 (반전, 그레이 스케일, 미러링 등)를 적용하십시오. - 안전하고 트래커가 없으며 100 % 오픈 소스. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed) English ---------------- - Compatible with nearly all video and audio streaming sites including Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast sites, etc. - URL rules to automatically set a custom playback rate depending on the website. - Optional hotkeys for adjusting speed, rewinding/forwarding, frame by frame analysis, and more. - Apply filters (invert, grayscale, mirroring, etc) on select elements like videos, or even the entire page. - Safe, no trackers, and 100% open source. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed)
description.pt-BR: Google Tradutor ----------- - Compatível com quase todos os sites de streaming de vídeo e áudio, incluindo Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, sites de podcast, etc. - Regras de URL para definir automaticamente uma taxa de reprodução personalizada, dependendo do site. - Teclas de atalho opcionais para ajustar a velocidade, rebobinar / encaminhar, análise quadro a quadro e muito mais. - Aplique filtros (inverter, escala de cinza, espelhamento etc.) em elementos selecionados, como vídeos ou até a página inteira. - Seguro, sem rastreadores e 100% de código aberto. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed) English ------------------ - Compatible with nearly all video and audio streaming sites including Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast sites, etc. - URL rules to automatically set a custom playback rate depending on the website. - Optional hotkeys for adjusting speed, rewinding/forwarding, frame by frame analysis, and more. - Apply filters (invert, grayscale, mirroring, etc) on select elements like videos, or even the entire page. - Safe, no trackers, and 100% open source. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed)
description.ru: переводчик Google -------------------------------- - Совместимость практически со всеми сайтами потокового видео и аудио, включая Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, сайты подкастов и т. Д. - Правила URL для автоматической установки пользовательской скорости воспроизведения в зависимости от сайта. - Дополнительные горячие клавиши для настройки скорости, перемотки / перемотки, покадрового анализа и многого другого. - Применяйте фильтры (инвертировать, оттенки серого, зеркальное отображение и т. Д.) К отдельным элементам, таким как видео, или даже ко всей странице. - Сейф, без трекеров, и 100% с открытым исходным кодом. (Https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed) English ----------------- - Compatible with nearly all video and audio streaming sites including Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast sites, etc. - URL rules to automatically set a custom playback rate depending on the website. - Optional hotkeys for adjusting speed, rewinding/forwarding, frame by frame analysis, and more. - Apply filters (invert, grayscale, mirroring, etc) on select elements like videos, or even the entire page. - Safe, no trackers, and 100% open source. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed)
description.tr: Google Çeviri ---------------------- - Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast siteleri vb.Dahil olmak üzere neredeyse tüm video ve ses akışı siteleriyle uyumludur. - Web sitesine bağlı olarak otomatik olarak özel bir oynatma hızı ayarlamak için URL kuralları. - Hızı, geri sarma / iletmeyi, kare kare analiz ve daha fazlasını ayarlamak için isteğe bağlı kısayol tuşları. - Videolar gibi belirli öğelere ve hatta tüm sayfaya filtreler (ters çevirme, gri tonlama, yansıtma vb.) Uygulayın. - Güvenli, izci yok ve% 100 açık kaynak. (Https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed) English -------------- - Compatible with nearly all video and audio streaming sites including Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast sites, etc. - URL rules to automatically set a custom playback rate depending on the website. - Optional hotkeys for adjusting speed, rewinding/forwarding, frame by frame analysis, and more. - Apply filters (invert, grayscale, mirroring, etc) on select elements like videos, or even the entire page. - Safe, no trackers, and 100% open source. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed)
description.zh-CN: 谷歌翻译 -------------- - 与几乎所有视频和音频流媒体站点兼容，包括Youtube，Netflix，Twitch，Spotify，播客站点等。 - URL规则，可根据网站自动设置自定义播放速率。 - 可选的热键，用于调整速度，后退/前进，逐帧分析等。 - 在所选元素（例如视频）甚至整个页面上应用滤镜（反转，灰度，镜像等）。 - 安全，无跟踪程序和100％开源。 （https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed） English ----------------- - Compatible with nearly all video and audio streaming sites including Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast sites, etc. - URL rules to automatically set a custom playback rate depending on the website. - Optional hotkeys for adjusting speed, rewinding/forwarding, frame by frame analysis, and more. - Apply filters (invert, grayscale, mirroring, etc) on select elements like videos, or even the entire page. - Safe, no trackers, and 100% open source. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed)
description.zh-TW: 谷歌翻譯 ------------------ - 與幾乎所有視頻和音頻流媒體站點兼容，包括Youtube，Netflix，Twitch，Spotify，播客站點等。 - URL規則，可根據網站自動設置自定義播放速率。 - 可選的熱鍵，用於調整速度，後退/前進，逐幀分析等。 - 在所選元素（例如視頻）甚至整個頁面上應用濾鏡（反轉，灰度，鏡像等）。 - 安全，無跟踪程序和100％開源。 （https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed） English ------------ - Compatible with nearly all video and audio streaming sites including Youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Spotify, podcast sites, etc. - URL rules to automatically set a custom playback rate depending on the website. - Optional hotkeys for adjusting speed, rewinding/forwarding, frame by frame analysis, and more. - Apply filters (invert, grayscale, mirroring, etc) on select elements like videos, or even the entire page. - Safe, no trackers, and 100% open source. (https://github.com/polywock/globalSpeed)

name.es: Global Speed: Control de velocidad de video
name.ja: Global Speed: ビデオ速度制御
name.pt-BR: Global Speed: Controle de velocidade de vídeo
name.zh-CN: Global Speed: 视频速度控制
name.zh-TW: Global Speed: 視頻速度控制

summary.en-US: Set a default speed for video and audio.
summary.es: Establezca una velocidad predeterminada para video y audio.
summary.ja: ビデオとオーディオのデフォルト速度を設定します。
summary.ko: 비디오 및 오디오의 기본 속도를 설정하십시오.
summary.pt-BR: Defina uma velocidade padrão para vídeo e áudio.
summary.ru: Установите скорость по умолчанию для видео и аудио.
summary.tr: Video ve ses için varsayılan bir hız belirleyin.
summary.zh-CN: 设置视频和音频的默认速度。
summary.zh-TW: 設置視頻和音頻的默認速度。
